hero.subtitle: KOZ is a Windows optimization app built from the same workflows used in our one‑to‑one tuning services for competitive players.
hero.description: While the app is in development, all updates, previews and changelogs are shared inside our Discord community with over 4,000 members and 2,000+ paying clients.
hero.previewAltLarge: KOZ app system overview large preview

beta.title: Early access to KOZ Optimizer
beta.description: KOZ is currently in open beta. Get access to the latest performance tweaks and help shape the next generation of PC optimization.
beta.feature3: Direct feedback channel to the dev team

stats.title: Performance you can measure
stats.subtitle: Live metrics reported by KOZ users, so you have a clear idea of what to expect before installing.

features.title: Built for gamers who want results
features.subtitle: KOZ focuses on what actually improves gaming performance, without bloat or noise. Everything is designed to be clear and fast to use.

network.title: Network optimization
network.description: Reduce ping spikes and stabilize your connection with network-level tweaks.

presets.title: Game presets
presets.description: Apply optimized presets for your favorite titles with a single click.

monitoring.title: Real-time monitoring
monitoring.description: Track CPU, RAM and latency in a clean, distraction‑free interface.

safe.title: Safe & reversible
safe.description: All tweaks are reversible. Restore your system to defaults anytime.

advanced.title: Advanced tweaking
advanced.description: Fine‑tune services, processes and network routes when you need full control.

lightweight.title: Lightweight
lightweight.description: Built to be fast and efficient, with minimal resource usage.

testimonials.title: Feedback from real players
testimonials.subtitle: These are just a few of the results reported by players using our Tier 3 optimizations, exclusive strafe setups and custom Windows builds.
testimonials.disclaimer: All feedback comes from real clients on our Discord server, where we share full clips, prints and detailed before/after results.

items.name: GODMOTA
items.quote: Service felt five‑star. PC finally handles casino slots and CS the way it should.

items.name: Bardock
items.quote: Second optimization with Krips, now with overclock. Went from barely playable city FPS to smooth 300+ on a heavy server.

items.name: dn
items.quote: Tried several optimizations before, nothing compares. FPS are locked and stable with zero input lag.

items.name: EsQ_23
items.quote: Top‑tier service, every question answered. Exclusive strafe feels better than ever and the system is clearly faster.
Two weeks after the session the setup still feels better every day. Exclusive strafe and 12.5 sens feel perfect in raids.

items.name: Dudyz
items.quote: Tier 3 speaks for itself. Huge FPS on base with 300 players and a solid boost on Valorant as well.

items.name: Relax
items.quote: Tier 3 turned arena fights into a different game. Super clean, fluid and fast. Exactly the kind of boost people look for.

items.name: tuber
items.quote: Massive upgrade in both consistency and responsiveness. The before/after clips make it obvious.

items.name: ezzy.exe
items.quote: No ksOS, just Tier 3 and exclusive strafe. Simple, efficient and far ahead of the usual ‘optimizer’ attempts you see around.

items.name: Félix
items.quote: Always had high FPS, but never reached this level of stability before. Tier 3 with exclusive strafe pushed it to a new ceiling.

download.title: Ready to
download.subtitle: KOZ is currently available for Windows, with more platforms on the roadmap. Download the beta and start testing the new performance engine.

footer.tagline: The performance optimizer built by gamers, for gamers.
